name: Green Hills Happiness Resort
description:
The year is 2035. The world is an industrialised mess. Overpopulation is at crisis levels. The air is unbreathable and green spaces have disappeared.

But not in Green Hills Happiness Resort! With air so fresh and views to die for, a lucky few have been chosen to explore this slice of paradise!

Controls:

A - Move left

D - Move right

SPACE - Jump

F - When you're all out of moves
